definition: (classical) this, that/he, she, they/(exclamatory final particle)/(initial particle, introduces an opinion)

sentences.english: He has simply been exposed as an adulterer and a fool.
sentences.chinese: 有人揭发他就是个奸夫和白痴。

sentences.english: The eye also of the adulterer waiteth for the twilight, saying, No eye shall see me: and disguises his face.
sentences.chinese: 奸夫等候黄昏，说，必无眼能见我，就把脸蒙蔽。

sentences.english: Thou hast kept the secret of thy paramour.
sentences.chinese: 你始终不肖泄露你的奸夫。

sentences.english: Capture the heart on the A Longnu of evil on the spot, the face about after accidentally drop kills adulterer leaves.
sentences.chinese: 当场捉奸的阿龙怒上心头，失手杀死奸夫后转身离去。

sentences.english: They think gold teeth drive ugly, not adulterer may be the big cheese.
sentences.chinese: 众人认为金牙驱奇丑，没可能是大芝的奸夫。

sentences.english: The eye also of the adulterer waiteth for the twilight, saying, No eye shall see me: and disguiseth his face.
sentences.chinese: 奸夫等候黄昏，说，必无眼能见我，就把脸蒙蔽。

definition: (of a woman) to take a lover
to carry on a clandestine love affair
to catch a couple in the act (adultery, illicit sexual relations)
to have secret ties with/to be in covert communication with (the enemy etc)/to engage in an illicit sexual relationship/adultery
a couple engaged in an illicit love affair/a cheating couple
to catch a couple in the act (adultery, illicit sexual relations)
lit. the red apricot tree leans over the garden wall (idiom)/fig. a wife having an illicit lover
(of a woman) to take a lover
